title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform - Wikipedia
snippet: At the Provincial level, there are 48 Directorates of Health and Population (one per province). The current minister is Abdelhak Saihi (since 9 September 2022). title: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | GHDx
snippet: Formerly named the Ministry of Health and Population (Ministère de la Santé et de la Population).

title: Division of Powers - Algeria Public health
snippet: Ministry of Health, Population and Hospital Reforms (FR)

title: Leadership in the Ministry of Health - PMC
snippet: Incoordination within different sectors and lack of action-oriented heads of departments can happen due to the enormity and complexity of the Ministry. It is important to have capable leadership at every level to drive their organisations to higher achievements.

title: Department of Health, Population, and Hospital Reform (Algeria) | Devex
snippet: Learn more about Department of Health, Population, and Hospital Reform (Algeria)'s jobs, projects, latest news, contact information and geographical presence. The Department of Health and Hospital Reform is the government agency responsible for Health in Alge
